N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7848.2 - Schedule and conduct of public comment hearings

State Regulations

The board shall establish a schedule specifying the times
and locations of the public comment hearings. The board shall hold at least
three hearings in both the downstate and upstate regions as those regions are
defined in section
6-102
(2)
of the Energy Law, to afford interested
persons a reasonable opportunity to offer written and oral comments on the
draft State Energy Plan. Notes
